item.description:
Orgasmic Breath Journey
Friday, July 31, 2009 7:30 â€“ 9:30pm $25

Each Chakra stores the collection of our core beliefs, emotions and experiences in correlation to seven fundamental themes in our life: survival, creativity, power, love, self-expression, wisdom, and divine connection.

Through this dynamic meditation you will awaken your sexual/life force energy, charge your system with creative vitality, clear and cleans each vital energy center, release past residue, expand your orgasmic range, and ignite your clarity, personal power and ability to manifest. Practicing this solo meditation within the energy field of the group increases everyone's energy! This active meditation is done to energizing music.

Wear loose, comfortable clothing. Bring a water bottle. Bring cash or check to pay at the door, or pay by credit card via PayPal.
item.how_to_find_us: come upstairs through the door to the left of the Burren
item.name: Orgasmic Breath Journey Meditation
